pullrequest.title: Add must_be_end_link element to link sdf

content.raw: As of SDFormat 1.7, users can specify [custom elements and attributes in SDFormat](http://sdformat.org/tutorials?tut=custom_elements_attributes_proposal&cat=pose_semantics_docs&). I think that is the best way to accomplish what you are trying to do since the tag is specific to your simulator.
content.html: As of SDFormat 1.7, users can specify custom elements and attributes in SDFormat. I think that is the best way to accomplish what you are trying to do since the tag is specific to your simulator.
